CustomField.formula: IF( Use_Per_Unit_Pricing__c, /* Discount defined per unit */ CASE( Discount_Type__c, "Fixed", MAX(0, Unit_Price__c - Discount_Value__c), "Percentage", MAX(0, Unit_Price__c * (1 - (Discount_Value__c / 100))), Unit_Price__c ), /* Legacy: spread fixed discount across the quantity */ CASE( Discount_Type__c, "Fixed", MAX(0, Unit_Price__c - (Discount_Value__c / MAX(1, Quantity__c))), "Percentage", MAX(0, Unit_Price__c * (1 - (Discount_Value__c / 100))), Unit_Price__c ) )
CustomField.label: Unit Net
